# ojp-row



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description | Type      | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `align`     | `align`     |             | `string`  | `'stretch'` |
| `cols`      | `cols`      |             | `string`  | `'12'`      |
| `dcols`     | `dcols`     |             | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `fullbleed` | `fullbleed` |             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `justify`   | `justify`   |             | `string`  | `'stretch'` |
| `mcols`     | `mcols`     |             | `any`     | `undefined` |
| `tcols`     | `tcols`     |             | `any`     | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description                                                                   |
| ------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--ojp-row--align-items`       | align-items property of the row. Defaults to `stretch`.                       |
| `--ojp-row--col-gap`           | Gap between columns. Defaults to `--space-2xs-xs`.                            |
| `--ojp-row--dcols`             | Number of columns in the row for desktop screens. Defaults to 12.             |
| `--ojp-row--gutter`            | Minimum gutter width (aka page padding). Defaults to `--space-s-3xl`.         |
| `--ojp-row--justify-items`     | justify-items property of the row. Defaults to `stretch`.                     |
| `--ojp-row--margin-inline`     | Inline margin between rows. Defaults to `--space-xs-s`.                       |
| `--ojp-row--max-wrapper-width` | Max wrapper width (not including gutters). Defaults to `1440px`.              |
| `--ojp-row--mcols`             | Number of columns in the row for mobile screens. Defaults to 12.              |
| `--ojp-row--row-gap`           | Vertical gap between stacking columns in a row. Defaults to `--space-2xs-xs`. |
| `--ojp-row--tcols`             | Number of columns in the row for tablet screens. Defaults to 12.              |
